trans-unit.source: Defines the contract for the basic state machine for all communication-oriented objects in the system, including channels, the channel managers, factories, listeners, and dispatchers, and service hosts.
trans-unit.target: Define o contrato para a máquina de estado básica para todos os objetos voltados para comunicações no sistema, incluindo canais, os gerentes de canal, fábricas, ouvintes, distribuidores e hosts de serviço.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> interface defines:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> interface define:

trans-unit.source: A set of open, close and abort methods for initiating state transitions:
trans-unit.target: Um conjunto de abrir, fechar e anular os métodos para iniciar as transições de estado:

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous versions of the open and close methods:
trans-unit.target: Versões assíncronas dos métodos de abrir e fechar:

trans-unit.source: A set of events that provide notifications of state transitions:
trans-unit.target: Um conjunto de eventos que fornecem notificações de transições de estado:

trans-unit.source: A common <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.State%2A> property for inspecting the state of an object
trans-unit.target: Um comum <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.State%2A> propriedade para inspecionar o estado de um objeto

trans-unit.source: Causes a communication object to transition immediately from its current state into the closed state.
trans-unit.target: Faz com que um objeto de comunicação faça a transição imediata do estado atual para o estado fechado.

trans-unit.source: This method indicates that any unfinished work should be ignored or ungracefully terminated before returning.
trans-unit.target: Este método indica que qualquer trabalho não concluído deve ser ignorado ou terminado de maneira brusca antes de retornar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Abort%2A> method can be used to cancel any outstanding operations, including outstanding calls to <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Abort%2A> método pode ser usado para cancelar operações pendentes, inclusive chamadas pendentes para <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A>.

trans-unit.source: To gracefully transition an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> state to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> state call <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para fazer a transição normalmente um <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> do <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> estado para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> estado chamada <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to close a communication object.
trans-unit.target: Inicia uma operação assíncrona para fechar um objeto de comunicação.

trans-unit.source: This method causes an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> to gracefully transition from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> state to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> state.
trans-unit.target: Este método faz uma <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> normalmente uma transição do <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> estado para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> estado.

trans-unit.source: Versions with and without an explicit timeout are provided.
trans-unit.target: Versões com e sem um tempo limite explícito são fornecidas.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: O delegado <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> que recebe a notificação da conclusão da operação de fechamento assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto, especificado pelo aplicativo, que contém informações de estado associadas à operação de fechamento assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to close a communication object.
trans-unit.target: Inicia uma operação assíncrona para fechar um objeto de comunicação.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> que faz referência à operação de fechamento assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: This method causes an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> to gracefully transition from any state, other than the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> state to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> state.
trans-unit.target: Este método faz uma <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> normalmente uma transição de qualquer estado que o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> estado para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> estado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose%2A> method allows any unfinished work to be completed before returning.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose%2A> método permite que qualquer trabalho não concluído ser concluída antes de retornar.

trans-unit.source: For example, finish sending any buffered messages).
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, concluir enviar todas as mensagens em buffer).

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose" /> was called on an object in the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose" /> foi chamado em um objeto no estado <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" />.

trans-unit.source: The default timeout elapsed before the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> was able to close gracefully.
trans-unit.target: O tempo limite padrão decorrido antes de o <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> poder ser fechado normalmente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that specifies how long the send operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> que especifica quanto tempo a operação de envio tem para ser concluída antes de atingir o tempo limite.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: O delegado <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> que recebe a notificação da conclusão da operação de fechamento assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto, especificado pelo aplicativo, que contém informações de estado associadas à operação de fechamento assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to close a communication object with a specified timeout.
trans-unit.target: Inicia uma operação assíncrona para fechar um objeto de comunicação com um tempo limite especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> que faz referência à operação de fechamento assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: This method causes an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> to gracefully transition from any state, other than the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> state to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> state with in a specified interval of time.
trans-unit.target: Este método faz uma <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> normalmente uma transição de qualquer estado que o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> estado para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> estado com em um intervalo de tempo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose%2A> method allows any unfinished work to be completed before returning.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose%2A> método permite que qualquer trabalho não concluído ser concluída antes de retornar.

trans-unit.source: For example, finish sending any buffered messages).
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, concluir enviar todas as mensagens em buffer).

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose" /> was called on an object in the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose" /> foi chamado em um objeto no estado <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" />.

trans-unit.source: The specified timeout elapsed before the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> was able to close gracefully.
trans-unit.target: O tempo limite especificado expirou antes de o <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> poder ser fechado normalmente.

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to close a communication object.
trans-unit.target: Inicia uma operação assíncrona para fechar um objeto de comunicação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginOpen%2A> method causes an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> to enter into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opening> state where it remains until its transition to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> state is completed or fails.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginOpen%2A> método faz com que um <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> inserir o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opening> estado onde permanecem até sua transição para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> estado é concluído ou falhar.

trans-unit.source: Versions with and without an explicit timeout are provided.
trans-unit.target: Versões com e sem um tempo limite explícito são fornecidas.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous open operation.
trans-unit.target: O delegado <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> que recebe a notificação da conclusão da operação de abertura assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous open operation.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto, especificado pelo aplicativo, que contém informações de estado associadas à operação de abertura assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to open a communication object.
trans-unit.target: Inicia uma operação assíncrona para abrir um objeto de comunicação.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references the asynchronous open operation.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> que faz referência à operação de abertura assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is instantiated, it begins in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> state.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> é instanciada, ele começa a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> estado.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> state, the object can be configured (for example, properties can be set, or events can be registered), but it is not yet usable to send or receive messages.
trans-unit.target: No <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> de estado, o objeto pode ser configurado (por exemplo, propriedades podem ser definidas ou eventos podem ser registrados), mas ainda não é utilizável para enviar ou receber mensagens.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginOpen%2A> method causes an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> to enter into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opening> state where it remains until the open operation succeeds, the open operation times out or fails and the object becomes faulted, or the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is aborted.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginOpen%2A> método faz com que um <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> inserir o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opening> estado onde permanecem até que a operação de abertura for bem-sucedida, a operação de abertura expira ou falha e o objeto torna-se com defeito, ou o <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> será anulada.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> state, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is usable (for example, messages can be received), but it is no longer configurable.
trans-unit.target: No <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> estado, o <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> pode ser usado (por exemplo, é possível receber mensagens), mas não é configurável.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> was unable to be opened and has entered the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> não pôde ser aberto e entrou no estado <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" />.

trans-unit.source: The default open timeout elapsed before the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> was able to enter the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened" /> state and has entered the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: O tempo limite padrão especificado expirou antes do <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> entrar no estado <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened" /> e ele entrou no estado <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that specifies how long the send operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> que especifica quanto tempo a operação de envio tem para ser concluída antes de atingir o tempo limite.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous open operation.
trans-unit.target: O delegado <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> que recebe a notificação da conclusão da operação de abertura assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous open operation.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto, especificado pelo aplicativo, que contém informações de estado associadas à operação de abertura assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to open a communication object within a specified interval of time.
trans-unit.target: Inicia uma operação assíncrona para abrir um objeto de comunicação dentro de um intervalo de tempo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references the asynchronous open operation.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> que faz referência à operação de abertura assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is instantiated, it begins in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> state.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> é instanciada, ele começa a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> estado.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> state, the object can be configured (for example, properties can be set, or events can be registered), but it is not yet usable to send or receive messages.
trans-unit.target: No <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> de estado, o objeto pode ser configurado (por exemplo, propriedades podem ser definidas ou eventos podem ser registrados), mas ainda não é utilizável para enviar ou receber mensagens.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A> method causes an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> to enter into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opening> state where it remains until the open operation succeeds, the open operation times out or fails and the object becomes faulted, or the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is aborted.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A> método faz com que um <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> inserir o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opening> estado onde permanecem até que a operação de abertura for bem-sucedida, a operação de abertura expira ou falha e o objeto torna-se com defeito, ou o <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> será anulada.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> state, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is usable (for example, messages can be received), but it is no longer configurable.
trans-unit.target: No <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> estado, o <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> pode ser usado (por exemplo, é possível receber mensagens), mas não é configurável.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> was unable to be opened and has entered the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> não pôde ser aberto e entrou no estado <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" />.

trans-unit.source: The specified timeout elapsed before the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> was able to enter the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened" /> state and has entered the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: O tempo limite especificado expirou antes do <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> entrar no estado <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened" /> e ele entrou no estado <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" />.

trans-unit.source: The operation must throw a <see cref="T:System.TimeoutException" /> if the specified <paramref name="timeout" /> is exceeded.
trans-unit.target: A operação deve lançar uma <see cref="T:System.TimeoutException" /> se especificado <paramref name="timeout" /> for excedido.

trans-unit.source: Causes a communication object to transition from its current state into the closed state.
trans-unit.target: Faz com que um objeto de comunicação faça a transição do estado atual para o estado fechado.

trans-unit.source: Causes a communication object to transition from its current state into the closed state.
trans-unit.target: Faz com que um objeto de comunicação faça a transição do estado atual para o estado fechado.

trans-unit.source: This method causes an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> to gracefully transition from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> state to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> state.
trans-unit.target: Este método faz uma <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> normalmente uma transição do <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> estado para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> estado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> method allows any unfinished work to be completed before returning.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> método permite que qualquer trabalho não concluído ser concluída antes de retornar.

trans-unit.source: For example, finish sending any buffered messages).
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, concluir enviar todas as mensagens em buffer).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> enters the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closing> state and remains in it until the transition to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> state is completed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> insere o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closing> estado e permanece nele até que a transição para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> estado é concluído.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> returns once the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> state is reached.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> Retorna uma vez o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> estado é atingido.

trans-unit.source: If the default close timeout elapses before the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is able to close gracefully, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is aborted.
trans-unit.target: Se o padrão de fechar o tempo limite expira antes do <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> é capaz de ser fechado normalmente, o <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> será anulada.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> is called on an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opening>, or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted> state, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is aborted.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> é chamado em uma <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> no <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opening>, ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted> estado, o <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> será anulada.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> is called on an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closing> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> state, the call returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> é chamado em uma <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> no <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closing> ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> de estado, a chamada retorna imediatamente.

trans-unit.source: There is also an asynchronous version of the close method that is initiated by calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose%2A> and completed by calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Também há uma versão assíncrona do método close iniciado chamando <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose%2A> e concluída chamando <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close" /> was called on an object in the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close" /> foi chamado em um objeto no estado <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" />.

trans-unit.source: The default close timeout elapsed before the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> was able to close gracefully.
trans-unit.target: O tempo limite de fechamento padrão decorrido antes de o <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> poder ser fechado normalmente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that specifies how long the send operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> que especifica quanto tempo a operação de envio tem para ser concluída antes de atingir o tempo limite.

trans-unit.source: Causes a communication object to transition from its current state into the closed state.
trans-unit.target: Faz com que um objeto de comunicação faça a transição do estado atual para o estado fechado.

trans-unit.source: This method causes an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> to gracefully transition from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> state to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> state within a specified interval of time.
trans-unit.target: Este método faz uma <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> normalmente uma transição do <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> estado para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> estado dentro de um intervalo de tempo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> method allows any unfinished work to be completed before returning.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> método permite que qualquer trabalho não concluído ser concluída antes de retornar.

trans-unit.source: For example, finish sending any buffered messages).
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, concluir enviar todas as mensagens em buffer).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> enters the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closing> state and remains in it until the transition to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> state is completed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> insere o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closing> estado e permanece nele até que a transição para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> estado é concluído.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> returns once the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> state is reached.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> Retorna uma vez o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> estado é atingido.

trans-unit.source: If the timeout elapses before the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is able to gracefully close, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is aborted.
trans-unit.target: Se o tempo limite expira antes do <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> é capaz de ser fechado, o <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> será anulada.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> is called on an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opening>, or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted> state, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is aborted.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> é chamado em uma <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> no <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opening>, ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted> estado, o <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> será anulada.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> is called on an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closing> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> state, the call returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> é chamado em uma <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> no <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closing> ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> de estado, a chamada retorna imediatamente.

trans-unit.source: There is also an asynchronous version of the close method that is initiated by calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose%2A> and completed by calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Também há uma versão assíncrona do método close iniciado chamando <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose%2A> e concluída chamando <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close" /> was called on an object in the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close" /> foi chamado em um objeto no estado <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" />.

trans-unit.source: The timeout elapsed before the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> was able to close gracefully.
trans-unit.target: O tempo limite expirou antes de o <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> poder ser fechado normalmente.

trans-unit.source: The operation must throw a <see cref="T:System.TimeoutException" /> if the specified <paramref name="timeout" /> is exceeded.
trans-unit.target: A operação deve lançar uma <see cref="T:System.TimeoutException" /> se especificado <paramref name="timeout" /> for excedido.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the communication object completes its transition from the closing state into the closed state.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o objeto de comunicação conclui sua transição do estado de fechamento para o estado fechado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the communication object first enters the closing state.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um objeto de comunicação entra em estado de fechamento primeiro.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the communication object first begins to transition from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> state into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> state, immediately after either the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose%2A> method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre quando o objeto de comunicação começa primeiro fazer a transição do <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> estado para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed> estado imediatamente após um o <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Close%2A> ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose%2A> método é invocado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that is returned by a call to the <see cref="Overload:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose" /> method.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> que é retornado por uma chamada para o método <see cref="Overload:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose" />.

trans-unit.source: Completes an asynchronous operation to close a communication object.
trans-unit.target: Conclui uma operação assíncrona para fechar um objeto de comunicação.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="Overload:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose" /> was called on an object in the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="Overload:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginClose" /> foi chamado em um objeto no estado <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" />.

trans-unit.source: The timeout elapsed before the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> was able to close gracefully.
trans-unit.target: O tempo limite expirou antes de o <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> poder ser fechado normalmente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that is returned by a call to the <see cref="Overload:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginOpen" /> method.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> que é retornado por uma chamada para o método <see cref="Overload:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginOpen" />.

trans-unit.source: Completes an asynchronous operation to open a communication object.
trans-unit.target: Conclui uma operação assíncrona para abrir um objeto de comunicação.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> was unable to be opened and has entered the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> não pôde ser aberto e entrou no estado <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" />.

trans-unit.source: The timeout elapsed before the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> was able to enter the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened" /> state and has entered the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: O tempo limite expirou antes de o <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> conseguir entrar no estado <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened" /> e ele entrou no estado <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the communication object first enters the faulted state.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um objeto de comunicação entra em estado de falha primeiro.

trans-unit.source: Causes a communication object to transition from the created state into the opened state.
trans-unit.target: Faz com que um objeto de comunicação faça a transição do estado criado para o estado aberto.

trans-unit.source: Versions with and without an explicit timeout are provided.
trans-unit.target: Versões com e sem um tempo limite explícito são fornecidas.

trans-unit.source: Causes a communication object to transition from the created state into the opened state.
trans-unit.target: Faz com que um objeto de comunicação faça a transição do estado criado para o estado aberto.

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is instantiated, it begins in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> state.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> é instanciada, ele começa a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> estado.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> state, the object can be configured (for example, properties can be set, or events can be registered), but it is not yet usable to send or receive messages.
trans-unit.target: No <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> de estado, o objeto pode ser configurado (por exemplo, propriedades podem ser definidas ou eventos podem ser registrados), mas ainda não é utilizável para enviar ou receber mensagens.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A> method causes an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> to enter into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opening> state where it remains until the open operation succeeds, the open operation times out or fails and the object becomes faulted, or the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is aborted.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A> método faz com que um <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> inserir o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opening> estado onde permanecem até que a operação de abertura for bem-sucedida, a operação de abertura expira ou falha e o objeto torna-se com defeito, ou o <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> será anulada.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> state, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is usable (for example, messages can be received), but it is no longer configurable.
trans-unit.target: No <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> estado, o <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> pode ser usado (por exemplo, é possível receber mensagens), mas não é configurável.

trans-unit.source: There is also an asynchronous version of the open method that is initiated by calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginOpen%2A> and completed by calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.EndOpen%28System.IAsyncResult%29>.
trans-unit.target: Também há uma versão assíncrona do método abrir iniciado chamando <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginOpen%2A> e concluída chamando <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.EndOpen%28System.IAsyncResult%29>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> was unable to be opened and has entered the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> não pôde ser aberto e entrou no estado <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" />.

trans-unit.source: The default open timeout elapsed before the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> was able to enter the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened" /> state and has entered the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: O tempo limite padrão especificado expirou antes do <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> entrar no estado <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened" /> e ele entrou no estado <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that specifies how long the send operation has to complete before timing out.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> que especifica quanto tempo a operação de envio tem para ser concluída antes de atingir o tempo limite.

trans-unit.source: Causes a communication object to transition from the created state into the opened state within a specified interval of time.
trans-unit.target: Faz com que um objeto de comunicação faça a transição do estado criado para o estado aberto em um intervalo de tempo especificado.

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is instantiated, it begins in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> state.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> é instanciada, ele começa a <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> estado.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> state, the object can be configured (for example, properties can be set, or events can be registered), but it is not yet usable to send or receive messages.
trans-unit.target: No <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> de estado, o objeto pode ser configurado (por exemplo, propriedades podem ser definidas ou eventos podem ser registrados), mas ainda não é utilizável para enviar ou receber mensagens.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A> method causes an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> to enter into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opening> state where it remains until the open operation succeeds, the open operation times out or fails and the object becomes faulted, or the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is aborted.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A> método faz com que um <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> inserir o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opening> estado onde permanecem até que a operação de abertura for bem-sucedida, a operação de abertura expira ou falha e o objeto torna-se com defeito, ou o <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> será anulada.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> state, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> is usable (for example, messages can be received), but it is no longer configurable.
trans-unit.target: No <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> estado, o <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> pode ser usado (por exemplo, é possível receber mensagens), mas não é configurável.

trans-unit.source: There is also an asynchronous version of the open method that is initiated by calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginOpen%2A> and completed by calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.EndOpen%28System.IAsyncResult%29>.
trans-unit.target: Também há uma versão assíncrona do método abrir iniciado chamando <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginOpen%2A> e concluída chamando <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.EndOpen%28System.IAsyncResult%29>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> was unable to be opened and has entered the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> não pôde ser aberto e entrou no estado <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" />.

trans-unit.source: The specified timeout elapsed before the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> was able to enter the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened" /> state and has entered the <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: O tempo limite especificado expirou antes do <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject" /> entrar no estado <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened" /> e ele entrou no estado <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Faulted" />.

trans-unit.source: The operation must throw a <see cref="T:System.TimeoutException" /> if the specified <paramref name="timeout" /> is exceeded.
trans-unit.target: A operação deve lançar uma <see cref="T:System.TimeoutException" /> se especificado <paramref name="timeout" /> for excedido.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the communication object completes its transition from the opening state into the opened state.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o objeto de comunicação conclui sua transição do estado de abertura para o estado aberto.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the communication object first enters the opening state.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um objeto de comunicação entra em estado de abertura primeiro.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the communication object first begins to transition from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> state into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> state, immediately after either the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginOpen%2A> method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre quando o objeto de comunicação começa primeiro fazer a transição do <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Created> estado para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Opened> estado imediatamente após um o <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.Open%2A> ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject.BeginOpen%2A> método é invocado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the communication-oriented object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado atual do objeto voltado à comunicação.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState" /> of the object.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState" /> do objeto.

trans-unit.source: The main communication states available to an <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> are:
trans-unit.target: A comunicação principal estados disponíveis para um <xref:System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject> são:

trans-unit.source: There are also transitory states that such an object can occupy when transitioning between the first three main states:
trans-unit.target: Também há estados transitórios que tal objeto pode ocupar ao realizar a transição entre os três primeiros estados principais:

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> defines the states that are valid for all communication-oriented objects in the system, including channels, listeners, the channel and listener factories, and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> class.
trans-unit.target: Isso <xref:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState> define os estados que são válidos para todos os objetos orientado pelas comunicações no sistema, incluindo canais, ouvintes, as fábricas de canais e ouvintes, e o <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost> classe.
